title: Check Out "The Hyde" @ 50 Jones
map_address: 50 Jones Street near Market & Golden Gate
posting_body: BRAND NEW APARTMENTS NOW LEASING-SCHEDULE YOUR VIRTUAL TOUR TODAY
Imagine coming home to a secluded oasis, in the heart of San Francisco’s thriving mid-market neighborhood.
At 50 Jones, studio, 1- and 2-bedroom apartments come complete with tasteful finishes and thoughtful conveniences.
The exclusive outdoor community space provides a welcoming respite from your busy day, while the central location connects you to innovative employers and emerging bars and restaurants.
It all meets at Jones + Market.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 556 Sq.
- Stainless steel appliances, including microwave and dishwasher
- Pre-Leasing Now- Schedule your Virtual Tour Today!
- Luxury wood-style vinyl plank flooring in living spaces, carpeted bedrooms, and hex tile baths*
- Roof Top Terrace- with iconic San Francisco Views
- Terrace includes grilling stations, dining areas, and fire pit
- Lobby and Lounge features social spaces, work from home areas and a sunny solarium Fitness Center with cardio equipment and flex Zen spaces
- Close to BART, MUNI- 100% walk score
- The Oasis, a landscaped courtyard with fire pit, social and relaxing spaces
- Sky Terrace features social seating and amazing views
*Pricing and availability subject to change without notice.
*Price is based on the current promotion, the concession is self-amortized to include free rent over the lease term.
*Price will vary if alternative lease term, floor, or apartment is chosen.
*Please contact to receive current market rent amount.
*Pictures may or may not depict the actual apartment.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
